snippet.title: 1979 Revolution - Steam Greenlight Teaser
snippet.description:
After less than 5 days 1979 REVOLUTION has officially been greenlit: http://bit.ly/1RmOrAf

All Footage Shown is from pre-release Game Build 

“We wanted change...we just didn’t know we’d have to set the world on fire to get it.” 
Based on actual events and real testimonials, 1979 Revolution brings players into the brooding world of a nation on the verge of collapse. Play as Reza, an aspiring photojournalist, and make life and death decisions as you explore the bloodied streets of Iran in the late 1970’s. 

iNK Stories combines critical choices, unique action-driven gameplay mechanics, with a distinct art style for an action-adventure experience set amongst tense world altering events. 

1979 Revolution’s Black Friday is the first episode in iNK Stories’s player-driven narrative series. Deemed ‘a truly revolutionary game’ by The New Yorker and one of the ‘Best Ideas’ by TIME, in 1979 Revolution players get a first hand experience to discover the gritty realities of revolution. Rockstar Games Alumni Navid Khonsari, at the helm of iNK Stories, merges mature content with substance to indie gaming to bring “turbulent history to life” Mashable. 

1979’s Talented cast includes Navid Negahban (Homeland, American Sniper), Farshad Farahat (Argo, 300: Rise of an Empire, State of Affairs), Omid Abtahi (Hunger Games, Better Call Saul, Argo), Bobby Naderi (Fear the Walking Dead, Taqwacores), Mozhan Marno (House of Cards, A Girl Walks Home Alone At Night, The Blacklist), Nicholas Guilak (Of Gods and Kings, 24), Mary Apick (Homeland, Beneath The Veil), Fariborz David Diaan (The Brink, Stoning of Soraya, Weeds).
